# Análisis RFM

## Row 1

### Chart 1

```{python}
#| title: "Distribución de Clientes por Segmento"
# Placeholder for a plot showing the number of customers in each segment
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

segments = ['Campeones', 'Leales', 'En Riesgo', 'Nuevos']
counts = [50, 150, 80, 220]

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.bar(segments, counts, color=['gold', 'royalblue', 'tomato', 'lightgreen'])
ax.set_ylabel('Número de Clientes')
plt.show()
```
